lang_name.chinesesimplified: 任务
lang_name.english: Task

lang_name.chinesesimplified:
通过钓鱼还清欠债
{0}/{1}条鱼
lang_name.english:
Pay off debts through fishing
{0}/{1} fish

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 喂！还在犯迷糊？！中鱼了！
lang_name.english: 喂！还在犯迷糊？！中鱼了！

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 年轻人技巧不错，这种块头的鱼可不常见，我花钱收了。
lang_name.english: 年轻人技巧不错，这种块头的鱼可不常见，我花钱收了。

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 可恶！就差一点！你的能力很强，还缺一些运气，我从你身上看到了当年的自己。
lang_name.english: 可恶！就差一点！你的能力很强，还缺一些运气，我从你身上看到了当年的自己。

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 你先回去吧，欠钱的事我替你摆平，之后我会再找你的。
lang_name.english: 你先回去吧，欠钱的事我替你摆平，之后我会再找你的。

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 好久不见，回到家乡的感觉如何？你当年的鱼竿可都还给你保留着呢。
lang_name.english: 好久不见，回到家乡的感觉如何？你当年的鱼竿可都还给你保留着呢。

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 1 玩家成功刺鱼
lang_name.english: 1 玩家成功刺鱼

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 嗬！
lang_name.english: Whoo-ee!

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 干得漂亮！小子！
lang_name.english: That's how it's done,son!

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 干净利落！
lang_name.english: Clean strike!

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 我的老天！
lang_name.english: By jove!

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 好样的！
lang_name.english: Attaboy！

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 把它拖上来！
lang_name.english: Hauling 'em in!

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 绷住了线！小子！
lang_name.english: Don't you dare give 'er slack now, son!

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 它没劲儿了...我这把老骨头都感觉到啦！
lang_name.english: She's tiring... I can feel it in my bones!

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 哈！瞧它被你溜得团团转！
lang_name.english: Ha! Got 'er dancing to YOUR tune now!

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 老天开眼！瞅见鳞片反光了！ 就差...就差那么一丁点儿...！
lang_name.english: By thunder, look at 'er shine! Almost... ALMOST...!

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 拽！使劲儿拽！
lang_name.english: Heave! Heave!

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 圣母玛利亚！别让它冲线！
lang_name.english: GOD BLESS AMERICA, DON’T LET ‘ER RUN!

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 手指贴紧线轮！贴紧！ ——你小子想被清杯吗？！
lang_name.english: Palms on the reel, SON! PALMS ON THE REEL!

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 泄力调松点——慢！慢！——不然主线要爆！
lang_name.english: Ease up the drag—EASY NOW!—or she’ll spool ya!

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 这他娘是条能抵税的鱼！ 你敢放跑它试试！
lang_name.english: THAT’S A TAX-WRITE-OFF FISH RIGHT THERE! DON’T YOU DARE LOSE ‘ER!

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 用膝盖顶住！别用腰硬扛！完犊子…它往航道冲了！
lang_name.english: Fight ‘er with your KNEES, not your back! Sweet Georgia Brown… SHE’S HEADED FOR THE CHANNEL!

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 抖竿！抖起来！ 跟它干到底！早该收这愣小子战斗腰带押金的…
lang_name.english: PUMP THE ROD! PUMP IT LIKE YOU MEAN IT! Should’ve charged the damn fighting belt…

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 哎——呀——！！你小子是拿钓竿当痒痒挠吗？！
lang_name.english: WEET MOTHER OF PEARL! Did you close your eyes when you set the hook, son?!

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 刚才那口稳得让我第三任太太的离婚律师来都不会空！
lang_name.english: That was a PERFECT bite! Even my ex-wife wouldn't have missed that one!

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 啧啧，我养的那条金毛犬去年截肢了，起竿都比你利索！
lang_name.english: Son, I've seen shrimp with better reflexes!

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 鱼都咬钩三秒了您才反应——搁这儿喂鱼呢？
lang_name.english: ou gotta STRIKE when you feel the tap-tap—not after the fish finishes its darn lunch!

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 跑啦？知道那条石斑鱼现在干嘛不？正带着全家逛海底珊瑚城笑话你呢！
lang_name.english: HAH! That trophy bluefin just laughed at you!

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 咋的？钓竿是您新盘的文玩啊？再摸该包浆了！
lang_name.english: Son, that rod ain't a walking stick!

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 隔壁八十岁坐轮椅的史密斯太太刚才都上两条了！
lang_name.english: Even my trophy marlin mount back at the clubhouse has seen more action today!

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 知道这船一小时泊位费多少吗？
lang_name.english: Tell you what - at this rate, we'll catch sunset before a fish.

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 潮水都快转流了...哎哟完犊子，根据我六十年经验，现在不抛竿待会儿必龟！
lang_name.english: My gardener's goldfish has better work ethic! You're on a $3 million yacht, not a park bench!

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 哎哟我滴亲娘！您当这是扔漂流瓶呢？不收线鱼还以为您做慈善投喂呢！
lang_name.english: Son, that lure ain't a submarine! You gotta retrieve the darn thing unless you're tryin' to start an artificial reef!

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 这拟饵是瑞典进口的！不是给你当鱼钩纪念币沉底收藏的！
lang_name.english: By Neptune's beard—are you waitin' for the fish to file a damn inspection report on your lure before you reel in?!

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 收！赶紧收！再不动轮子这饵都快在底下长珊瑚了！
lang_name.english: That's a $28 hand-painted crankbait, not a lake decoration! Reel like you mean it!

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 哎哟我去！您当这是抛绣球呢？不收线等着鱼自己咬钩，您咋不干脆给它们发请帖呢？！
lang_name.english: What in tarnation?! You just gonna leave that $60 jerkbait out there like it's some kinda underwater museum exhibit? REEL, BOY, REEL!

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 这收线速度...我家乌龟看了都摇头！您这是钓鱼还是给鱼表演慢动作回放呢？
lang_name.english: Son, I've seen sloths move faster than your retrieve! Even my arthritis acts quicker than this!

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 知道这铁板多少钱吗？不收线您不如直接撒钞票下去，鱼还能叼着去买饵！
lang_name.english: That's a topwater lure, not a dang boat anchor! If you wanted to feed the fish, I coulda just thrown my caviar overboard!

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 模仿鱼说话* ‘嘿兄弟们快来看啊，这傻人类又给我们送免费装饰品来了！’
lang_name.english: By the seven seas! Are you tryin' to train the fish to come inspect your lure like it's some kinda aquatic petting zoo?!

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 收线啊大哥！再不动手这饵都要在底下建立家庭了！
lang_name.english: At this rate, that lure's gonna grow barnacles before a fish even looks at it twice!

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 得，别收了。
lang_name.english: You know what? Just leave it.

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 好家伙！ 这拉力够劲！瞧这大弯弓！
lang_name.english: HOT DAMN! Now THAT'S how you bend a rod, son! A textbook catch!

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 俱乐部那群老东西今晚该睡不着觉喽！
lang_name.english: This beauty's gonna look mighty fine hanging next to my 1987 marlin in the yacht club!

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 苍天有眼啊！这鳞片亮的！镀了金似的！
lang_name.english: WELL I'LL BE! This brute's got shoulders like a linebacker!

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 够资格进我船头吉祥物陈列室了！
lang_name.english: That's not a fish, that's a family heirloom!

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 值了！值了！就这一条，够吹三年！
lang_name.english: YEE-HAW! wipes tear with monogrammed handkerchief Kid... this right here?

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 老杰克他们那群空军司令该馋哭喽！
lang_name.english: This is why we brave sunburns and divorce! Magnificent!

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 祖坟冒青烟啊！ 这稀罕物！
lang_name.english: SWEET CHARIOT! This bad boy's rarer than my willingness to sign a prenup!

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 够买你手里那根竿子二十次！您这是付费来发呆的？
lang_name.english: You waiting for it to jump in the boat with a reservation card?

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 过个百八十年考古学家捞起来，还能命名个《二十一世纪人类空军化石》。
lang_name.english: Maybe in 100 years archaeologists'll dig it up and call it '21st century human fishing failure artifact'.

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 得用我存古巴雪茄的恒温箱供起来！
lang_name.english: Gotta call Field & Stream magazine right now!

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 嘿！睡美人！竿梢都弯成问号了！ 提竿！现在！
lang_name.english: Hey! Sleeping Beauty!That thing in your hands ain’t a clothesline—your rod’s bent like a question mark! SET THE HOOK! NOW!

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 除非你想用脸接鱼钩！
lang_name.english: Unless you wanna wear that lure as a nose ring!

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 不错不错...按‘跳海废柴折扣价’，这条抵你债务的0.0001%！加油啊，再有699条就能上岸喽！
lang_name.english: Well well... At ‘jump-into-ocean loser rates’, this covers 0.0001%! Only 699 more to go, champ!

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 看见三点钟方向那艘快艇没？你债主派来盯梢的...
lang_name.english: See that speedboat at 3 o’clock? Your debt collectors...

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 按黑市价...这条值你两根手指头！当然～要是敢私藏...老子亲自帮你‘分装’给债主！
lang_name.english: Black market rate says... This one’s worth two fingers! Try skimming profits though... I’ll ‘prep’ the shipment for your creditors personally.

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 看到没小子？这才叫翻身的鱼！
lang_name.english: Now THAT's what I call a comeback fish!

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 哈！现在开始每一条都是纯赚！
lang_name.english: Ha! From now on it's all profit!

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 这条的钱够买双新鞋了...当然，如果你还打算上岸的话。
lang_name.english: This one's worth a new pair of shoes... if you're planning to go ashore, that is.

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 怎么，钓上瘾了？这条的钱够你买艘小艇了...当然，得是二手的。
lang_name.english: What, hooked on fishing now? This one could buy you a dinghy... a used one, anyway.

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 卧槽！这力道——！小子你钓到海怪了吗？！
lang_name.english: HOLY--! What the hell did you hook?!

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 啧，这条绝对破纪录的...可惜啊，够买下你债主的命了。
lang_name.english: That was a record-breaker... Could've bought out your loan sharks twice over.

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 知道吗？这种鱼在我们这行叫'银行行长'...
lang_name.english: Know what we call that fish? The Bank Manager...

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 因为它总是带着你的存款跑路！
lang_name.english: Cause it always runs off with your damn savings!

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 行了小子，拿着钱滚蛋吧！记住——下次再跳海，记得先看看下面有没有老子的船！
lang_name.english: Alright kid, take the money and scram! Just remember—next time you jump ship, check if my boat's underneath first!

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 区区几个臭钱就把你逼得跳海？
lang_name.english: You jumped overboard for this chump change?

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 记住喽，在这片海上...老子说你能上岸，阎王爷都得排队等着！
lang_name.english: Listen close, on these waters...when I say you're clean, even the devil waits his damn turn!

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 你终于回来了！我最近发现一个超棒的钓点...明天要不要一起去？这次可不准再突然消失啦！
lang_name.english: You're finally back!I found an amazing fishing spot recently... Wanna go tomorrow? No more vanishing acts this time!

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 这条够买他们晚一天打断你的腿了！
lang_name.english: This baby buys you 24 more hours with working kneecaps!

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 啧，在老子这儿，连鱼饵都比你的债主有信用！
lang_name.english: Hell, even my bait's got better credit than your creditors!

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 点击开杯靓仔
lang_name.english: 点击开杯靓仔

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 瑞尔·泰昆
lang_name.english: Reel Tycoon

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 菲恩
lang_name.english: Finn

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 嘿！那个杯线开关是装饰品吗？
lang_name.english: Hey! Is that bail just for decoration?

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 你等着鱼自己跳上来签投降书呢？
lang_name.english: You waiting for the fish to jump up and surrender?

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 怎么？指望路亚饵自己游出去？
lang_name.english: What? Expecting the lure to swim out on its own?

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 要不要再给你配个遥控器？
lang_name.english: Need a remote control for that thing?

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 成功刺鱼，优先级1
lang_name.english: 成功刺鱼，优先级1

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 刺鱼失败，优先级2
lang_name.english: 刺鱼失败，优先级2

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 5秒未拉线，优先级3
lang_name.english: 5秒未拉线，优先级3

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 5秒未抛线，优先级4
lang_name.english: 5秒未抛线，优先级4

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 鱼脱钩，优先级5
lang_name.english: 鱼脱钩，优先级5

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 成功钓上108g的鱼，优先级6
lang_name.english: 成功钓上108g的鱼，优先级6

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 拉力达到10，优先级7
lang_name.english: 拉力达到10，优先级7

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 鱼距离角色距离大于50m，优先级8
lang_name.english: 鱼距离角色距离大于50m，优先级8

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 玩家点击第2条鱼的抛竿按钮，优先级9
lang_name.english: 玩家点击第2条鱼的抛竿按钮，优先级9

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 玩家点击第3条鱼的收线按钮，优先级10
lang_name.english: 玩家点击第3条鱼的收线按钮，优先级10

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 玩家点击第4条鱼的入护按钮，优先级11
lang_name.english: 玩家点击第4条鱼的入护按钮，优先级11

lang_name.chinesesimplified: ID=1的旁白结束播放，优先级12
lang_name.english: ID=1的旁白结束播放，优先级12

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 鱼离角色距离小于15m，优先级13
lang_name.english: 鱼离角色距离小于15m，优先级13

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 5秒未抛线，且成功刺鱼,优先级14
lang_name.english: 5秒未抛线，且成功刺鱼,优先级14

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 玩家点击第5条鱼的抛竿按钮且刺鱼失败，优先级15
lang_name.english: 玩家点击第5条鱼的抛竿按钮且刺鱼失败，优先级15

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 成功刺鱼或失败刺鱼，优先级16
lang_name.english: 成功刺鱼或失败刺鱼，优先级16
